Articles.Content:
ok this problem is alot more... well... complicated than others for the simple fact that i can't even launch the game to start with.

this is what i wrote to the devs in the support section of the ksp website.

Hi,

It seems that the .zip version of the Linux build of KSP is sort of broken.

I haven't moved anything and I've extracted it normally (previous versions still work) but 1.0 doesn't seem to work.

I then went onto a terminal to see what was wrong and found out that a "mscorlib.dll" was either missing or in the wrong place. (because it was trying to search for it in a different path to where i found a similar .dll file.

if you need any more details then don't be afraid to contact me I'll try and give you as much info about this as I can ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-"Antimatter001"

now if you guys have any questions or if one of you guys has found how to fix this please just leave a post I'd be happy to get this fixed and over with ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
